name: EZ Flash Calibration File
summary: A TRTX file is a General Motors vehicle calibration file used by TRIFECTA Performance EZ Flash. Car enthusiasts can use EZ Flash to apply the settings a TRTX file contains to their General Motors vehicle, modifying the vehicle's default settings and performance. TRIFECTA Performance provides applicable TRTX files to customers when they purchase EZ Flash.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
